ygData.subject: Guild name and charter
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello eveyrone I was at the guild chat tonight trying to help iron-out the name and purpose of our group.  Our offical name right now is The Unity.  But it has
ygData.messageBody:
Hello eveyrone

I was at the guild chat tonight trying to help iron-out the name and purpose
of our group. Our offical name right now is The Unity. But it has come to
our attention that there is another guild named Unity. It was suggested
that we change our name as to be distinct form this group. Many suggestion
were thrown about, and I personally tended to by hyper-critical of them
because I wanted a guild name and charter that would fit role-players as
well as non-role players, good, neutral, and evil charachters. It was also
important to me to be identofied as a group for GLBT people and their
friends, while still keeping true to the fantasy style of EQ, and the
Norrathian culture. This feat was assisted by many poeple in the chat. So
many suggestions were made, but I sincerely feel that my following proposal
fits best with what we all intend. I hope that we can all join together on
all serves with this guild name and charter and have some fun. David, do
you know how, or if we can cange our nbame now? I hope so! Of course i
want people to make changes and or suggestions to this, and i will leave
that compliing of that info to David :)

Guild name: Force of Synergy

Charter: Forged by gay, lesbian, bisexual, and transgendered people of
Norrath, and their friends, who saw a fractured society, to form alliances
of respect, knowledge, and truth, though not necessarily of love, between
the many peoples of Norrath...this is the Force of Synergy.

Now what?

-joe
=============================
Joseph J. Normandin
josephn@...
http://acs.bu.edu:8001/~josephn
=============================
